A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was awesome\, fun to watch\, and engaging\, but it dropped all the plot-lines the previous film set up and basically ruined the following film's potential selling points. If it wasn't star-wars It'd be fine\, but it is and you can't drop things like that about a literal saga. Aside from that there was also a disengaging amount of pandering and jarring pacing. The two stars I gave are for the cast. who were wonderful. Mark was great and so was Adam\, but the movie itself was a hot mess.
